job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelaars van moderne dataplatformen spelen een cruciale rol in het ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van deze systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and maintaining systems, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Deze talen zijn essentieel voor het schrijven van scripts, het ontwikkelen van applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Writing scripts and developing applications are fundamental software development activities.
Performing data analysis is part of understanding and managing data, aligning with the exploratory data analysis aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Kennis van data-engineeringprincipes is cruciaal. Dit omvat het ontwerpen van data pipelines, het beheren van dataopslag en het waarborgen van de datakwaliteit.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes key responsibilities within data engineering: designing pipelines, managing storage, and ensuring quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelaars moeten in staat zijn om data te analyseren en inzichten te visualiseren
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing and visualizing data to gain insights is a core component of data engineering and preparation for further use.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelaars moeten bekend zijn met cloud services en -tools om schaalbare en kostenefficiënte oplossingen te bouwen.
job_tasks.justification: Familiarity with cloud services for building scalable solutions relates to managing the infrastructure and operational aspects of the platform.

job_tasks.phrase: De opkomst van generatieve AI vraagt om dataplatformen die grote hoeveelheden gestructureerde en ongestructureerde data kunnen verwerken. Ontwikkelaars moeten in staat zijn om deze technologieën te integreren in bestaande systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of generative AI technologies into existing systems, a key aspect of AI-adjacent software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Het gebruik van IaC-tools zoals Terraform en Ansible is essentieel voor het automatiseren van de infrastructuur en het verbeteren van de efficiëntie en consistentie van dataplatformen.
job_tasks.justification: The use of IaC for automating infrastructure is a direct responsibility within operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: dataplatformen essentieel voor organisaties die data willen benutten voor strategische beslissingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase connects the technical role to strategic business objectives and data utilization.
Focusing on cost-efficiency in solutions aligns with understanding business needs and constraints.
Gaining insights from data is a key business objective that technical roles support.

job_tasks.phrase: op de hoogte te blijven van de laatste trends en technologieën
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the need for continuous learning and staying updated with technological advancements.

job_tasks.phrase: Door te leren en ervaren kun je telkens vaardigheden toevoegen aan jouw skill set.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the importance of learning and skill acquisition, a core aspect of adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: robuuste, schaalbare en veilige dataplatformen te bouwen.
job_tasks.justification: Building robust, scalable, and secure platforms implies a commitment to quality and reliability, which can be linked to responsible development practices.

soft_skills.phrase: op de hoogte te blijven van de laatste trends en technologieën
Door te leren en ervaren kun je telkens vaardigheden toevoegen aan jouw skill set.
robuuste, schaalbare en veilige dataplatformen te bouwen.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses on building and maintaining data platforms, which involves significant software development (1.A.1), data engineering (1.B.3), and operations/cloud infrastructure (1.A.2). While it mentions the integration of generative AI, the core tasks are centered around the platform itself rather than the specialized development or fine-tuning of AI models. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where the role builds or maintains software that directly uses or supports AI/ML as a core part of its functionality, with the output being an AI-powered system or feature enabled by the platform.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement clearly outlines the responsibilities related to data platform development, data engineering, cloud infrastructure, and the integration of generative AI. The language used is specific enough to confidently categorize the tasks and assign a profile.
